Class PropertyGeometryUtils

java.lang.Object
com.example.utils.PropertyGeometryUtils
public class PropertyGeometryUtils extends Object
Utility class for handling geometric operations related to properties. Provides methods for calculating centroids, average areas, and area statistics grouped by owners.

  • Method Details

    • getCentroid

      public static org.locationtech.jts.geom.Point getCentroid(Property property)
      Calculates the centroid (midpoint) of a property's geometry.
      Parameters:
      property - The property for which the centroid is to be calculated.
      Returns:
      The centroid of the property's geometry as a Point, or null if an error occurs.

    • calculateAverageArea

      public static double calculateAverageArea(List<Property> properties)
      Calculates the average area of a list of properties.
      Parameters:
      properties - The list of Property objects.
      Returns:
      The average area as a double.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the property list is null, empty, or contains no valid areas.

    • calculateAverageAreaPerOwner

      public static Map<String,Double> calculateAverageAreaPerOwner(List<Property> properties)
      Calculates the average area of properties for each owner.
      Parameters:
      properties - The list of Property objects to be analyzed.
      Returns:
      A map containing the average area per owner.
